attributes.action: raise the minimum age to gamble in the uk to 25 years old
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want to make the minimum age limit of 25 years old for when you are aloud to gamble,many people lose money or are becomeing broke at a very early age and have know money for the future, by raiseing the age limit for all to gamble to 25yrs could save many young people from being in debt.
